main event: A pilot observed a bright, bluish-white spherical glow in the sky while flying a commercial airliner over South Africa.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about 8 inches in diameter and was perfectly spherical.
The object remained stationary in relation to the aircraft, which was at 35,000 feet altitude.
The object's appearance changed from a sphere to an elliptical shape as the sky became brighter.
The pilot recorded the azimuth and altitude and estimated the object to be 10-15 miles away.
The weather conditions included a layer of clouds around 15,000 feet below the aircraft.
witnesses: pilot and co-pilot of a commercial airliner
